job_description:
Location: Bad Homburg (Metropolitan Area Frankfurt), Germany
Location: Waterloo, ON, Canada

Who we are:
Packed with brilliant, passionate people, Maxon is deeply rooted in the creative industry and committed to empowering the artistic community. We are Maxonians. We encourage and motivate each other to be curious learners. We are obsessed with customer fulfillment and inspiration –
before, during and after purchase. If you too want to be a Maxonian and help bring to market the finest software products for 2D and 3D visual effects, motion graphics, games, AR/MR/VR, visualization and general design, let’s talk.

What you will do:

ZBrush is the leading and award-winning digital sculpting software used in film/visual effects and video game companies. To maintain this leadership, we are looking for creative and like-minded programmers to join our team.

Develop and maintain high-performance 3D graphics applications for various platforms
As part of our international development team you will be working closely with other developers, QAs, UX designers and product managers

What we are looking for:

An experienced C++ developer with a strong background in 3D
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, related technical field, or equivalent practical experience
A solid understanding of 3D programming concepts, as well as proficiency in using 3D modelling and animation software
Strong artistic skills and experience in 3D asset creation
Strong skills in writing efficient, maintainable and documented code with maximum performance
Strong debugging skills to find issues in the existing codebase
Fluent in written and spoken English
Bonus: Fluent in spoken French
Dependable team player with a genuine interest in delivering an excellent product, a strong sense of responsibility, the ability to work independently, meet deadlines and communicate well

What we offer:

You will be offered permanent employment, full-time, at one of our offices listed above. You will be part of a highly motivated international team of specialists working in an environment that offers a warm welcome with detailed onboarding and a dedicated mentor for a familiarization period as well as a wide range of individual development possibilities. Interested in joining our team? Fill out the form or email us your resume/CV (.pdf).
Don’t meet every single requirement? At Maxon we embrace diversity, are avid explorers and curious learners, so if you’re excited about this role but your experience doesn’t entirely match every qualification in the job description, we encourage you to apply in any case. You may be just the right candidate for this or other positions.
We’re looking forward to hearing from you!
Maxon is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace.
